hero.title: A Smart System for Measuring and Building the Athletic Development Journey
hero.subtitle: Discover Natural Ability is an integrated system that works with schools and academies to measure athletes' natural abilities and organize their progress within a clear development journey—measured on the field, documented digitally, and reinforced through lasting achievements.

intro.title: The Challenge
intro.description: Today, many athletes participate in sports without a clear view of their development path or what they are truly achieving over time. Discover does not change the training methods used within institutions. Instead, it adds a layer of structure and clarity that makes progress understandable for the athlete, visible to parents, and genuinely valuable for the institution.

point2.title: Clear Development Stages
point2.description: Easy-to-understand stage system for all stakeholders

point3.title: Smart Motivation
point3.description: Combines digital achievement with real-world symbolism

point4.title: Works Alongside Your Programs
point4.description: Designed to work alongside existing programs without interference

howItWorks.title: How Does Discover Work Without Changing Your Approach?
howItWorks.subtitle: Discover was designed to function as an organizational layer on top of what already exists—without modifying curricula, imposing training methods, or increasing operational load.

stage1.title: Assessment
stage1.description: The system begins with a scientific assessment conducted on-site, within the institution's environment, to measure the athlete's natural abilities in a realistic and clear manner.

stage2.title: Analysis and Digital Profile Creation
stage2.description: Assessment results are analyzed digitally, and a development profile is created to reflect the athlete's current level.

stage3.title: Development Stage Assignment
stage3.description: The athlete is placed into a development stage that aligns with their actual abilities, without unfair comparisons or unrealistic expectations.

stage4.title: Reassessment
stage4.description: After defined training periods, the athlete is reassessed to measure real and tangible progress.

stage5.title: Achievement and Motivation
stage5.description: Each stage concludes with a documented digital achievement and a physical medal bearing the child's name and the academy's name. These medals are not short-term rewards—they represent milestones in a journey, often displayed at home and retained as part of long-term memory.

continuity.title: Continuity
continuity.description: When an athlete understands where they stand, sees their progress stage by stage, and recognizes their achievements, their connection to sport—and to the institution—naturally deepens.

progressClarity.title: Progress Clarity
progressClarity.description: Documented progress that can be reviewed and understood. Clear development stages that define where the athlete stands. A development path that can be explained and shared.

storytelling.title: Real Storytelling and Content
storytelling.description: Achievements, stages, and medals create content rooted in real experience, not promotional messages or broad promises.
results: Clear differentiation based on story, not ads

brandingLegacy.title: Academy Name Reinforcement
brandingLegacy.description: When medals are displayed in the athlete's room, the academy's name remains present in the memory of the child and the family.

partnershipModel.title: A Partnership That Organizes—Not Replaces
partnershipModel.subtitle: The institution retains full control over training methods and curricula.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.description: Discover operates as an independent system layer within the institution, supporting what already exists without interfering with daily operations.

whoFor.title: Who This System Is For
whoFor.type1: Institutions seeking long-term continuity, not seasonal enrollment
whoFor.type2: Organizations aiming for a structured and transparent sports experience
whoFor.type3: Leadership teams focused on long-term value

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Discover tailored training programs designed to unlock natural abilities and build champions

about.title: About Discover Natural Ability
about.subtitle: Building the Future of Youth Sports Development

origin.title: Our Origin Story
origin.description: Through direct field experience with professional athletes, sports institutions, and parents of developing athletes, we discovered a critical gap: Many athletes train consistently, yet lack real clarity about their level or how they are progressing over time. Parents support their children, but often struggle to see tangible results that can be understood or followed. At the same time, institutions invest significant effort, without a unified system that clearly demonstrates long-term value. Discover Natural Ability was created to address this gap.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Discover does not add a new program—it creates a real development journey, measured on the field, documented digitally, with achievements that are displayed on walls and carry the institution's name in the child's memory for years.

gamification.title: Structured Assessment Framework
gamification.description: Scientific, field-based assessments that measure natural athletic abilities in realistic environments

athleticProfile.title: Digital Development Profiles
athleticProfile.description: Comprehensive athlete profiles that track progress, stages, and achievements over time

progressTracking.title: Clear Stage Progression
progressTracking.description: Transparent development stages that show exactly where athletes stand and where they're heading

rewardSystem.title: Meaningful Recognition
rewardSystem.description: Physical medals and digital achievements that represent real milestones, not just participation

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We work exclusively with institutional partners—academies, schools, sports clubs, and government entities—to provide a layer of organization and clarity that enhances what already exists, without changing training methods or interfering with operations.

contact.title: Start the Partnership Conversation
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss how Discover can support your institution

clarification.title: Partnership Scope
clarification.description: Discover Natural Ability works exclusively with institutional partners, including:
